meanings.definition: Coming after the eighteenth in a series.
meanings.sent1: The nineteenth cupcake was decorated with colorful sprinkles.
meanings.sent2: She wore her nineteenth dress to the party.
meanings.sent3: The nineteenth cookie in the jar looked mischievously delicious.
meanings.sent4: His nineteenth attempt at solving the puzzle finally succeeded.
meanings.sent5: The nineteenth star in the sky twinkled brightly.

meanings.sent1: She ate the nineteenth slice of the pizza.
meanings.sent2: The nineteenth book on the shelf caught her eye.
meanings.sent3: The nineteenth piece of the puzzle was missing, making it impossible to complete.
meanings.sent4: Each member received their nineteenth share of the treasure.
meanings.sent5: The nineteenth flower in the garden bloomed beautifully.

meanings.sent1: He was born on the nineteenth of May.
meanings.sent2: The nineteenth in line eagerly waited for their turn.
meanings.sent3: The nineteenth student to arrive was awarded a special prize.
meanings.sent4: She marked her calendar for the nineteenth of the month.
meanings.sent5: The nineteenth page of the book held the most exciting twist.
